title: The Gathering
description: Argon has been a peaceful world but now there is a threat to their very exsistence. The elders foreseen this danger long ago and prepared for this day. Now it is up to the three gaurdians to bring home the six chosen before Amar and his followers find and kill them. Argon is a world of magic and lore. Where it's people can actually see and talk to thier Gods.
author: Megan Kuykendall
